meanings.definition: A person who believes in the possibility of improvement or progress.
meanings.sent1: The meliorists in our community work hard to make things better for everyone.
meanings.sent2: Meliorists are always looking for ways to make the world a better place.
meanings.sent3: The meliorists decided to throw a party to improve everyone's mood.
meanings.sent4: Her optimism and determination made her stand out as a true meliorist.
meanings.sent5: The group of meliorists painted a mural to inspire positive change in the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: Those who advocate for positive change or reform.
meanings.sent1: We need meliorists like her to push for positive changes in our society.
meanings.sent2: The meliorists organized a peaceful protest to demand reform.
meanings.sent3: The meliorists' enthusiasm for change was contagious among the community.
meanings.sent4: As a meliorist, she never shies away from fighting for what she believes in.
meanings.sent5: The meliorists' voices echoed through the halls of government, calling for reform.
